response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is a true masterpiece, designed with unparalleled craftsmanship and equipped with cutting-edge technology. It's not just a product; it's an experience that elevates your daily life. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, I believe its value exceeds $12,000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for a special introductory price of $15,000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly exceptional at a price that reflects its extraordinary qualities. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
